channel.title: Posts on Madison's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Madison's Blog

item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.3 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.3 query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR " result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity')+ coord_flip()+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homerun Totals")+ xlab("Team Name")+ ylab("Homeruns") ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity')+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homerun Totals")+ xlab("Team Name")+ ylab("Homeruns")

item.title: Histogram
item.description: library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.3 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.3 #extracting the data------- query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) #visualize the data------- ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="blue",fill="orange",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Body-weight Distribution for Baseball Players") ## Warning: Removed 854 rows containing non-finite values (stat_bin).

item.title: Scatter Plot
item.description: library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.3 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.3 query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR),sum(SO) FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>400" sqldf(query) ## playerID sum(HR) sum(SO) ## 1 aaronha01 755 1383 ## 2 bagweje01 449 1558 ## 3 bankser01 512 1236 ## 4 beltrad01 445 1584 ## 5 beltrca01 421 1693 ## 6 bondsba01 762 1539 ## 7 cabremi01 446 1516 ## 8 cansejo01 462 1942 ## 9 dawsoan01 438 1509 ## 10 delgaca01 473 1745 ## 11 dunnad01 462 2379 ## 12 evansda01 414 1410 ## 13 foxxji01 534 1311 ## 14 gehrilo01 493 790 ## 15 giambja01 440 1572 ## 16 gonzaju03 434 1273 ## 17 griffke02 630 1779 ## 18 guerrvl01 449 985 ## 19 jacksre01 563 2597 ## 20 jonesan01 434 1748 ## 21 jonesch06 468 1409 ## 22 killeha01 573 1699 ## 23 kingmda01 442 1816 ## 24 konerpa01 439 1391 ## 25 mantlmi01 536 1710 ## 26 matheed01 512 1487 ## 27 mayswi01 660 1526 ## 28 mccovwi01 521 1550 ## 29 mcgrifr01 493 1882 ## 30 mcgwima01 583 1596 ## 31 murraed02 504 1516 ## 32 musiast01 475 696 ## 33 ortizda01 541 1750 ## 34 ottme01 511 896 ## 35 palmera01 569 1348 ## 36 piazzmi01 427 1113 ## 37 pujolal01 591 1053 ## 38 ramirma02 555 1813 ## 39 ripkeca01 431 1305 ## 40 robinfr02 586 1532 ## 41 rodrial01 696 2287 ## 42 ruthba01 714 1330 ## 43 schmimi01 548 1883 ## 44 sheffga01 509 1171 ## 45 snidedu01 407 1237 ## 46 soriaal01 412 1803 ## 47 sosasa01 609 2306 ## 48 stargwi01 475 1936 ## 49 teixema01 409 1441 ## 50 thomafr04 521 1397 ## 51 thomeji01 612 2548 ## 52 willibi01 426 1046 ## 53 willite01 521 709 ## 54 winfida01 465 1686 ## 55 yastrca01 452 1393 query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS CareerHR,sum(SO) AS CareerSO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>400" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=CareerSO,y=CareerHR),size=3)+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts and Homeruns - The Best")+ xlab("Career Strikeouts")+ ylab("Career Homeruns") code{white-space: pre;} pre:not([class]) { background-color: white; } if (window.

item.title: Time Series
item.description: library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.3 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.3 query<-"SELECT yearID, HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID, y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID, y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Throughout the Year's")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
